sentences.english: Before this, I went to walmart to buy shower towel.
sentences.chinese: 在这之前先去沃尔马买浴巾。

sentences.english: "One-time" curiosity, "bath" towels and baby, and lavender.
sentences.chinese: 一次性浴巾好奇与婴儿洗澡，薰衣草和。

sentences.english: One was a lady wearing nothing but a bath towel.
sentences.chinese: 其中一位女士除了一条浴巾外一丝不挂。

sentences.english: This is your destination, and one-stop baby bath towel, you have been looking for.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的一站式目的地，浴巾宝贝，你一直在寻找的。

sentences.english: They discreetly showered his body underneath the bath towel and gave him a close shave.
sentences.chinese: 他们慎重地冲洗他在浴巾下的身体，剔去了一些毛发。

sentences.english: The thick pile of a luxurious bath towel touches soft.
sentences.chinese: 这块华丽浴巾的厚绒面摸起来很柔软。

sentences.english: The mainly products are towel racks of high or medium quality, removable racks and so on.
sentences.chinese: 产品主要有高中档浴巾架，活动架等系列产品。

sentences.english: Fold your towel into a small square and place it under your knees for support.
sentences.chinese: 把浴巾叠成小方块垫在你的膝盖下面。

sentences.english: We have duly received the goods of our Order No. A105 for Cotton Jacquard Bath Towels.
sentences.chinese: 我方第A105号订单项下提花浴巾已及时收到。

sentences.english: Peter emerged from the bathroom swathed in a towel.
sentences.chinese: 彼得从浴室里出来，身上紧紧裹着一条浴巾。

sentences.english: Fix the Towel Ring on the base with the M5 inner hexangular set screw…
sentences.chinese: 将浴巾环架体用M5的内六角紧顶螺钉固定在底座上。

sentences.english: We should pack beach towels and sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 我们应带上浴巾和防晒剂。

sentences.english: E. Fix the bath towel wreath on the base with the M5 inner hexangular set screw.
sentences.chinese: 将浴巾环体用M5的内六角紧顶螺钉固定在底座上。
